title: üèà Whiteout Weekend 2025 üèà
subtitle: Penn State vs Oregon - The ultimate Whiteout experience! Get ready for an unforgettable weekend of football, food, and fun.

header.customCSS: background: linear-gradient(rgba(0,0,0,0.4), rgba(0,0,0,0.4)), url('white-out.webp') center/cover; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.3); text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.7);

options.desc:
The Waffle Shop
üö® IMPORTANT: Go here on Friday! It will be too busy on Saturday/Sunday with all the game day crowds. Try the famous Strawberry Waffles or Chocolate Chip Pancakes.

Hike Mount Nittany
Classic Penn State experience! Take in the stunning views of campus and the valley from the Mike Lynch Overlook. Perfect way to work up an appetite.

Evening Option A: Local Whiskey
End the day with a huge selection of whiskeys and upscale pub food. Great atmosphere to get in the game day spirit! Leaves the evening open to barhop around downtown afterward.

Evening Option B: Champs North Atherton
Sports bar with wings, burgers, and a lively atmosphere. Perfect for getting into the game day mood with fellow fans!

Bagel Love Cafe
üç≥ Pro tip: You can get delivery! Start your game day with fresh bagels and breakfast sandwiches without leaving your room.

ESPN College GameDay
üìç Old Main Lawn, University Park
Fan pit opens at 6:30 AM ET - arrive early! Experience the excitement and energy of College GameDay live from Penn State.

Tailgate & Pre-Game
Join the legendary Penn State tailgating scene! Get your white gear ready and soak in the atmosphere before the big game.

üèà PENN STATE vs OREGON WHITEOUT GAME üèà
üìç Beaver Stadium, 1 Beaver Stadium, University Park, PA 16802
‚è∞ Kickoff: 7:30 PM ET
üì∫ Broadcast: NBC
üéΩ DRESS IN WHITE! Experience the most electric atmosphere in college football!
Sleep in and recover from the amazing game day experience!
Head home with memories of an unforgettable Whiteout weekend!
